description:
A simple, secure, decentralized VPN mesh network solution


This is a feature version that the most import feature is the web support.
User can run easytier-core with following command to connect easytier to the config server: easytier-core -w <USER_NAME> and then visit http://easytier.cn/web#/auth to manage this easytier instance.
New Feature
- Support config easytier using web server by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/436
- Support running as a Windows service. by @hvvvvvvv in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/445
- Support register easytier as system service with easytier-cli. by @hvvvvvvv in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/456
- support respond stun request in udp tunnel by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/484
Bugfix
- fix icmp/udp subnet proxy not work with public server relay by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/431
- Optimize log file name suffix by @HKMV in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/433
- Optimize building speed by @fanyang89 in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/442
- Fix app not displayed when click on the dock icon under macOS by @fanyang89 in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/424
- Improve panic message by @shenjiangqiu in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/437
- support compress for rpc and tun data by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/473
- fix high cpu usage when client proto mismatch by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/481
- Add windows arm64 target to CI by @strongtz in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/486
- fix command line help message of mtu param by @bh1xaq in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/429
